item.title: Appearances
item.description: Gabe is sometimes asked to join them to take part, or discuss certain things. Some of them may get added here for you to browse. .video-gallery { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(320px, 1fr)); gap: 24px; padding: 24px; background: #f8f9fa; } .video-item { background: #fff; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08); overflow: hidden; display: flex; flex-direction: column; } .video-container { position: relative; width: 100%; padding-bottom: 56.
